name: Island Hopper (Maxime Preaux)
description:
Super rough game made for a 48h game jam!

Works with an Xbox controller, and maybe a Playstation controller, but certainly not a keyboard and mouse setup.

Twin-stick controls, RT to shoot, Y to swap weapons.

Changelog

11/9/2015 - Increased game-over screen opacity, reduced health globes spawn rate, add blood spurts.
